ygData.subject: Re: Charm (was: Karana Lambent Trading)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I don t know in what way you mean that it is broken, but I used it EXTENSIVELY since the patch to interrupt spellcasters in Solusek A, and it worked
ygData.messageBody:
>
> It *is* broken.

Well, I don't know in what way you mean that it is broken, but I used it EXTENSIVELY since the
patch to interrupt spellcasters in Solusek A, and it worked perfectly. I was not using it to
mezmerize something for a long period of time, its common other usage, so it may in fact be
broken in that way.

It is definately stunning long enough to disrupt caster mobs though, an essential use if you're
camping Solusek Mages for their booties.

Jyzan
